title: The Gary Null Show
content:
The aggressive assault against natural supplements – who is behind it and why Jim Turner is one of the original Nader... <!--more--> Raiders and a principal in the Washington law firm Swankin and Turner where he represents consumer interests concerning food, drugs, health and the environment, produce safety and regulatory issues.  He is the board chair of Citizens for Health and the author of “Voice of the People: The Transpartisan Imperative in American Life.” His organization Voice of the People is dedicated to establishing a citizens’ cabinet in government.   Jim has appeared before every major consumer regulatory agency including the FDA and NIH, the EPA, the Consumer Product Safety Commission and Federal Trade Commission.
  In the past Jim has served as a special counsel for several Senate committees such as the Committee on Food, Nutrition and Health and the Government Operations Subcommittee on Government Research.
 VOP.org  Swankin-Turner.com
